name: REChess
description:
ReChess is the next evolution of 5D Time Warping Chess. Use your eleven senses and tickle your small little brain to solve puzzles. 

Warning: This game has excplicit and gory content and also uses mature language. Epileptics beware. Do not do at home. 26 Redbulls cans went into this game and 4 hrs of sleep.

TLDR: Find the fastest way to mate with the newly introduced rules.
